'''1.17.1''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for Nintendo Switch on June 14, 2021.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4402856034573-Minecraft-1-17-1-Switch-Only-|title=Minecraft - 1.17.1 (Switch Only)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=June 14, 2021}}</ref> This version is still compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.17.0|1.17.0]].
